attributes.action: All Students should be allowed to wear black jeans in school
attributes.background: Wearing skirts in school can be very uncomptable and inappropriat. The material can be very itchy and skirts fly up easily which can be very embarrassing. Overall jeans are a much better idea because when we go to school we will feel comfortable and enjoy learning a lot more :-)))

rejection.details: This is a decision for individual schools. You could raise this with your school's senior management or governing body.
